title: Stream: Jay-Z & Kanye West – Watch the Throne
content:
So after the teasers, trailers and bucket loads of hype, Jay-Z and Kanye West’s collaborative project, Watch the Throne has finally been released; at least on Itunes for now.

If you’re waiting for the physical release on August 12, the album is streaming over on Hype Beast. Check it out now.

Josh reviewed Watch The Throne, check it out here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
